name: Joanne Dark: Labyrinth of Battle
description:
Controls:
ARROW KEYS to move, A to attack, D to defend, SPACE to progress through dialogue.

Description:
Play as Joanne Dark to explore the Darkest Dungeon. Use attack patterns against your enemies to beat them and progress further towards your goal. For each floor cleared, gain an additional heart! Can you defeat the boss at the end of the game?

Duality Theme:
Joanne Dark has the ability dualism allowing her to wield both a shield and sword simultaneously to discover the attack patterns of enemies.

Made in 7 days for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023 with The Demon Head Team.

ganthefan (Programmer): Hello again! Here is my first collaborative game jam with people from across the world. This time I did mostly the programming. What's cool about this project is that everything is true 2D! I essentially ended up writing a custom rendering system for this project (using Unity input and sprites mostly). I hope you are able to enjoy the unique 2D art style and animations!
